member.name: T:customer_app.Controller
member.summary: The controller method for the program. THis handles all main functionality of the program.

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.AttachObserver(customer_app.IObserver)
member.summary: Attaches an observer that listens for updates from NotifyObservers
member.param: The observer object being attached

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.NotifyObservers
member.summary: Called when there is an update that should notify other components of the program

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.CreateCustomer(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new customer and set their details
member.param: The first name of the new customer
The last name of the new customer
If the new customer is a bank staff member

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.DeleteCustomer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete an existing customer
member.param: The id of the customer being deleted

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.EditCustomer(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Edit an existing customers details
member.param: The customers ID
The customers updated first name
The customers updated last name
If the customer is a bank staff member

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.CreateAccount(customer_app.Customer,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Create a new account for a and set the opening balance and possible overdraft limit
member.param: The customer creating the account
The type of account being created
The opening balance of the account
The overdraft limit of the account, if omni account type

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.AddAccountToCustomer(customer_app.Customer,customer_app.Account)
member.summary: Add an account object to an existing customer object
member.param: The customer the account is being added to
The account being added to the customer

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.MakeDeposit(customer_app.Account,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Deposit money from an account
member.param: The account being deposited from
The amount being deposited

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.MakeWithdrawal(customer_app.Account,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Withdraw money from an account
member.param: The account being withdrawn from
The amount being withdrawn

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.MakeTransfer(customer_app.Account,customer_app.Account,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Transfer money from one account to another
member.param: The "from" account for the transaction
The "to" account for the transaction
The amount being transferred

member.name: M:customer_app.Controller.AddInterest(customer_app.Account)
member.summary: Calculate interest for an account
member.param: The account being acted on
